title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 713 - Standards Of Construction For Nursing Home Facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 713 - Standards Of Construction For Nursing Home Facilities

State Regulations

Subpart 713-1 - Standards For Nursing Home Construction Projects Completed Or Approved Prior To August 25, 1975 (§ 713-1.1 to 713-1.11)

Subpart 713-2 - Standards For Nursing Home Construction Projects Completed Or Approved Between August 25, 1975 And July 1, 1990 (§ 713-2.1 to 713-2.24)

Subpart 713-3 - Standards For Nursing Home Construction Projects Completed Or Approved Between July 2, 1990 And December 31, 2010 (§ 713-3.1 to 713-3.26)

Subpart 713-4 - Standards For Nursing Home Construction After December 31, 2010 (§ 713-4.1 to 713-4.10)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 713

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §2803

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
